attributes.action: Ban the use of plastic in packaging of skincare, shampoos, soap, bodywash. Etc
attributes.additional_details: It would reduce everyones plastic waste without severely impacting on peoples everyday life, which will be good for the environment, reduce landfill and help battle climate change.
attributes.background: Ban the use of plastic bottles and tubs etc. to package soaps, shampoos, conditioners, bodywash, bodylotions, facial creams, facial skin care products, deodorants.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open, on a similar topic, that you might like to sign:

Ban All Single Use Plastics and Plastic Packaging to Save Our Planet
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607466

Ban all plastic packaging
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603901
